alert.note: Alert for Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 3:23PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Victoria County through 345 PM CDT... At 322 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Salem, or 12 miles northeast of Victoria, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Victoria, Fordtran, Victoria Colony Creek Country Club, Victoria Mall, Brentwood Subdivision, Inez, Salem, Victoria Detar Hospital North, Victoria Regional Airport, Telferner, Nursery and Ball Airport Area. This includes the following highways... US Highway 59 between mile markers 624 and 632. US Highway 77 between mile markers 560 and 576. US Highway 87 between mile markers 796 and 810. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
